description:
In this course,

1. You will learn some simple but popular Thai dishes that you can easily prepare in minutes.

2. You will know how to find the ingredients for each recipes.

3. You will learn basic Thai culture of having food which is going to help if you travel to Thailand.

Moreover,  If you want to learn how to cook Easy Thai dessert, I also have courses waiting for you in Udemy. 

I hope you guys enjoy it.

And if you want to take it up a notch! Please check out Easy Thai Cooking Level 2 Course.
title: Easy Thai Cooking Level1: The beginning of Thai Food Journey
